text: Jamin Pugh (January 25, 1984 – January 17, 2023) was an American professional wrestler best known by his ring name Jay Briscoe. He was best known for his time with Ring of Honor, where at the time of his death was one-half of the ROH World Tag Team Champions with his brother Mark Briscoe in their 13th reign. He was also a two-time ROH World Champion and ROH World Six-Man Tag Team Champions. On January 17, 2023, Briscoe died in a car accident in Laurel, Delaware, 8 days before he would have turned 39. His death was announced on Twitter by AEW and ROH owner, Tony Khan. == Championships and accomplishments == *Combat Zone Wrestling ** CZW World Tag Team Championship (2 times) – with Mark Briscoe *Extreme Rising **Match of the Year (2012) with Mark Briscoe vs. Blk Out vs. los Dramáticos **Extreme Rising Moment of the Year (2012) with Mark Briscoe Debut in a Cage match against Blk Out and los
